content: All deleted files are moved to 'Trash'. Restore files deleted by mistake or delete them permanently. Files in 'Trash' are automatically deleted after 30 days. Please note, that the files deleted from the 'Trash' cannot be restored any longer.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when a file or folder has been moved to the "Trash", informing users that deleted files cannot be restored and will be automatically deleted after 30 days. It appears in the UI as part of an empty screen for archive folders, specifically on the header.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation uses quotes around "Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‡Ù…Ù„Ø§Øª" (Trash) which may not be consistent with the overall UI style. Consider whether single quotes or no quotes are preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review UI guidelines for the proper use of quotes or ensure consistency with other UI elements.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent use of capitalization for 'Trash'. Should be consistently 'SÉ™bÉ™t' or consistently capitalized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 'SÉ™bÉ™t' should be used consistently throughout the translation, or capitalized as 'SÆBÆT' to match the English 'Trash'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Siz onlarÄ± bÉ™rpa edÉ™ bilÉ™rsiniz, vÉ™ ya onlarÄ± Ã¶mÃ¼rlÃ¼k silÉ™ bilÉ™rsiniz' is slightly awkward. The repetition of 'onlarÄ±' can be improved.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'permanently delete' is translated as 'Ã¶mÃ¼rlÃ¼k silÉ™ bilÉ™rsiniz'. While 'Ã¶mÃ¼rlÃ¼k' means 'lifelong', it doesn't accurately convey the meaning of permanent deletion of data in this context. It sounds more like an action that lasts a lifetime.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Ã¶mÃ¼rlÃ¼k silÉ™ bilÉ™rsiniz' with 'tam ÅŸÉ™kildÉ™ silÉ™ bilÉ™rsiniz' (completely delete) or 'mÃ¼tlÉ™q silÉ™ bilÉ™rsiniz' (absolutely delete).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sekce 'KoÅ¡' je mÃ­sto, kam jsou vÅ¡echny smazanÃ© soubory pÅ™emÃ­stÄ›ny' is a bit literal and could be more naturally phrased. It translates to 'The 'Trash' section is a place where all deleted files are moved'. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the 'Trash' functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: VÅ¡echny smazanÃ© soubory jsou uloÅ¾eny do 'KoÅ¡e'. (All deleted files are stored in 'Trash')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ProsÃ­m berte v Ãºvahu, Å¾e pokud vymaÅ¾ete VaÅ¡e soubory z 'KoÅ¡e', jiÅ¾ je nemÅ¯Å¾ete znovu obnovit' is a bit formal and could be simplified. 'ProsÃ­m berte v Ãºvahu' translates to 'Please consider'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'VaÅ¡e' (your) is consistent, but might be more accessible to replace with a more general form (like 'svÃ©').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing all instances of 'VaÅ¡e' with 'svÃ©' for broader accessibility. While technically correct, it's slightly more formal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'restore files deleted by mistake' is translated as 'wiederherstellen, wenn sie versehentlich gelÃ¶scht wurden'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural German phrasing would be 'Dateien wiederherstellen, falls sie versehentlich gelÃ¶scht wurden' or 'Dateien wiederherstellen, falls diese versehentlich gelÃ¶scht wurden'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dateien wiederherstellen, falls diese versehentlich gelÃ¶scht wurden

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'delete them permanently' is translated as 'unwiderruflich entfernen'.  While understandable, 'dauerhaft lÃ¶schen' or 'dauerhaft entfernen' are more common and idiomatic for permanently deleting files in German.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: dauerhaft lÃ¶schen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Please note, that...' is translated as 'Bitte beachten Sie, wenn...'.  'Bitte beachten Sie, dass...' is a more appropriate translation for 'Please note that...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bitte beachten Sie, dass...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'cannot be restored any longer' is translated as 'kÃ¶nnen diese nicht mehr wiederhergestellt werden.'  A more concise and natural translation would be 'kÃ¶nnen nicht mehr wiederhergestellt werden'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: kÃ¶nnen nicht mehr wiederhergestellt werden

While technically correct, 'ÎšÎ¬Î´Î¿Ï‚ Î±Î½Î±ÎºÏÎºÎ»Ï‰ÏƒÎ·Ï‚' is the more standard and accurate translation for 'Trash' in a computing context within Greek.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Usted puede restaurarlos en el caso si ellos fueron eliminados por error" is grammatically awkward. The 'en el caso si' is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Usted puede restaurarlos si fueron eliminados por error.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Tenga en cuenta, que cuando usted elimina los archivos de la 'Papelera de reciclaje' ellos no pueden ser recuperados." is grammatically awkward and can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tenga en cuenta que los archivos eliminados de la 'Papelera de reciclaje' no pueden ser recuperados.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'restore them' is translated as 'restaurarlos'. While technically correct, a more natural and clear translation might be 'recuperarlos'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider changing 'restaurarlos' to 'recuperarlos' for better flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistency in the capitalization of 'Papelera de reciclaje'. It's capitalized throughout the translation but should be consistent with the English 'Trash'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent capitalization, either capitalizing 'Papelera de reciclaje' throughout or not.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses single quotes for 'Trash', while the Finnish translation uses double quotes for 'Roskakori'. This inconsistency should be resolved to maintain visual consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change all instances of 'Roskakori' to use single quotes: 'Roskakori'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "All deleted files are moved to 'Trash'" is not accurately translated. 'La section 'Corbeille' contient les fichiers supprimÃ©s' literally translates to 'The 'Trash' section contains the deleted files,' which is not as clear as the English version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'Tous les fichiers supprimÃ©s sont dÃ©placÃ©s vers la 'Corbeille'' or 'Les fichiers supprimÃ©s sont stockÃ©s dans la 'Corbeille''.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'restore them by mistake' is not fully conveyed. 's'ils ont Ã©tÃ© supprimÃ©s par erreur' implies they were deleted by someone, not by mistake itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'si vous les avez supprimÃ©s par erreur' or 'si vous les avez supprimÃ©s involontairement'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'delete them permanently' is not perfectly captured. 'les Ã©liminer de maniÃ¨re permanente' is a bit formal and could be more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'les supprimer dÃ©finitivement' or 'les supprimer complÃ¨tement'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Please note that' is translated as 'Il est Ã  noter que'. This is grammatically correct but very formal for user-facing text. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Attention' or 'Veuillez noter que'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'when you delete the files from the 'Trash'' is translated as 'quand vous supprimez les fichiers de la 'Corbeille''. This is correct but slightly awkward.  A more natural phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'lorsque vous supprimez les fichiers de la 'Corbeille'' or simply 'en supprimant les fichiers de la 'Corbeille''.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Files in 'Trash' are automatically deleted after 30 days' could benefit from a slightly smoother flow in Armenian. While technically correct, it sounds a little abrupt. Consider rephrasing for better readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Restore files deleted by mistake' is translated as 'JÅ«s varat vai nu atjaunot tos, ja tie tiek izdzÄ“sti kÄ¼Å«das dÄ“Ä¼'.  While understandable, it could be more directly translated as 'JÅ«s varat atjaunot failus, kas izdzÄ“sti kÄ¼Å«das dÄ“Ä¼'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Je kan deze terugzetten als ze per ongeluk verwijderd zijn of je kan ze permanent verwijderen' is grammatically awkward. The use of 'je kan' is repetitive and the structure is not ideal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Je kunt deze terugzetten als ze per ongeluk verwijderd zijn, of je kunt ze permanent verwijderen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Restore files deleted by mistake' is translated as 'Je kan deze terugzetten als ze per ongeluk verwijderd zijn'. While understandable, a more direct and natural translation would be 'Je kunt verwijderde bestanden terugzetten als ze per ongeluk verwijderd zijn' or 'U kunt verwijderde bestanden terugzetten als ze per ongeluk verwijderd zijn'. The current translation implies that 'deze' refers to the entire trash folder instead of the files.
